topics.body:
"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538e7bea636872316b520400#post_538e7bea636872316b520400
White people: we really suck. This message brought to you by the Drunk and Bitter Foundation.

Something I find funny. Whenever you see something mocking white people its usually the most waspy or rednecky thing you could imagine. This bugs me because I'm a huge metalhead. What, we're not good enough to be made fun of?!

Seriously though, if you imagine someone making fun of "white" music its always some terrible country or easy listening shit, never metal or punk or even rock and roll in general despite the fact I can count the number of non white metal heads I know on one hand. Perhaps its too much of fringe thing. You don't exactly hear metal on pop stations after all.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
